about_the_game:
"My social circles are divided into three, stalwart, mutually exclusive groups.

A first of chronically online Tumblr users. I've drifted in and out of several and now exist in one with next to no ties to my home country.

A second of extremely normal heterosexuals. The worst they've seen are Instagram wellness reels and Discord does not exist to them.

And now, apparently, a third of rubber-coated kinksters who want to rearrange my guts.

I feel like someone like me shouldn't have a third.”

LATEX, LEATHER, LIPSTICK, LOVE, LUST is an interactive fiction piece for unemployed British trans men in their 20s with no career prospects whose only major social interactions happen over Discord. Other people can play it as well, I guess.

Play the game (for free!) that had people giving such rave reviews as:

"So beautiful, so intense, so funny."

"I almost cried at several points, and ended up crying at the end."

"dear god this was an experience"

"the first interactive fiction to make me feel *actually* anxious and afraid"

"[slurs]"

And won the most controversial entry in IFComp 2024!

content_descriptors.notes: LATEX, LEATHER, LIPSTICK, LOVE, LUST is a mature story featuring various explicit and consensual BDSM sexual acts, suicidal ideation, references to self harm, as well as a deeply unsavory analysis of very unpleasant, very online people. A full list of content warnings can be seen in-game from the main menu under "PERVERSIONS".

name: LATEX, LEATHER, LIPSTICK, LOVE, LUST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run Chrome, you can run this

short_description: A self-described "chronically online" trans guy goes to a kink club thinking it will fix him. It doesn't.
